sentences.english: The household division is an important thing in rural family.
sentences.chinese: 分家析產是農戶家庭生活中的重要事件。

sentences.english: These changes had profound influences on Japan Agricultural Co-operatives.
sentences.chinese: 農戶結構的變化對日本農協的組織產生了深刻影響。

sentences.english: The thugs' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 附近的農戶對匪徒之殘毒恨之入骨。

sentences.english: About 20 farmers and 45 hectares around Danyang were affected.
sentences.chinese: 丹陽有約20家農戶和45公頃瓜田受到影響。

sentences.english: Families would often organize working teams from their surplus labor and send them around to do work for others.
sentences.chinese: 各農戶常把多餘的勞力組織起來實行換工。

sentences.english: The farmer is one of the components in the plant protection economic system.
sentences.chinese: 農戶是植保經濟系統的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: Farmers off the wow gold fruits of joy to reckon the coefficient on the handheld.
sentences.chinese: 關閉的喜悅謝文東水果農戶估計在手持係數。

sentences.english: Rural mutual financial cooperative(RMFC) is a typical case of those innovations.
sentences.chinese: 農戶資金互助合作社，就是這種創新的典型案例。

sentences.english: A farmer's day was labor-intensive, beginning well before sunrise and ending at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 農戶一天的工作強度仍然很大，日出而作日落而息。

sentences.english: Focus on farmers strengthens agricultural scientific research and technical exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 以農戶爲中心，加強農業科研與技術開發工作。

sentences.english: Liu Hong had installed himself in one of the farmers' huts.
sentences.chinese: 劉洪自己住在一個農戶的茅草屋裏面。

sentences.english: Firstly, the peasant household's income flux and the employment decision-making are described and their features are made.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究農戶的收入流及其就業決策行爲。

sentences.english: There are simply too many backyard farmers and village households," she said.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的後院養殖者和農戶實在太多了，”她說。

sentences.english: A few shovel loads later, the farmer finally looked down the well, and was astonished at what he saw.
sentences.chinese: 鏟了幾剷土之後，農戶往井裏看了看。

sentences.english: So the company researches on the snakes and they hand them over to the farms for breeding.
sentences.chinese: 因此公司研究蛇並且手把手的教農戶飼養蛇。

sentences.english: He is a small farmer a very poor farm er barely making a living.
sentences.chinese: 他是個小農戶，很窮的莊稼人，勉強維持生計。

definition: collective (decision)/joint (effort)/a group/a team/en masse/as a group
to go to town/to enter a big city (to live or work)
great family/rich family/large landlord/conspicuous spender or consumer
